Uses of Class
coloradocollege.ifroning.Item

Uses of Item in coloradocollege.ifroning
 

Subclasses of Item in coloradocollege.ifroning
 class Key
          A key is an item that is used on an activator.
 class Potion
          A potion is a specialized item that can be used on the player.
 class Teleporter
          A teleporter is a specialized item that moves the player from their current location to a new location.
 

Methods in coloradocollege.ifroning that return Item
 Item Inventory.getItem(int index)
          Gets an item of a given index from the inventory, if it exists.
 Item Inventory.getItem(java.lang.String itemName)
          Gets an item of the given name from the inventory, if it exists.

          Drops an item from the inventory so that it lands in the player's current location.

          Returns true if the given item is in the inventory.
 java.lang.String PlayerInventory.pickUp(Item anItem)
          Picks up an item in the player's current location.
 void Inventory.removeItem(Item anItem)
